## AI-Powered Playbook Creation
Turn your knowledge into income

# Create & Sell Your Custom  AI‑Powered Playbook

Upload your notes, generate beautifully formatted content, and start earning, no writing required.

[Generate Playbook](https://tryforged.vercel.app/login)

## How It Works

Transform your knowledge into income in just three simple steps

01

### Upload Your PDF

Drag and drop your notes, guides, or any PDF with valuable knowledge. We turn your raw content into a monetizable asset.

02

### AI Converts It Into a Structured Playbook

Our AI extracts key points, adds a title and summary, and formats your content into a polished digital playbook.

03

### Sell Your Playbook & Keep 100%

Set your own price, customize your page, and share your AI-generated playbook with a unique link. Every sale goes directly to you.

## Pricing

Upload your notes or PDFs, generate beautiful AI-crafted playbooks, set your price, and keep 100% of every sale.

MonthlyYearly

Monthly Plan

$20

[Start Creating](https://tryforged.vercel.app/login)

Unlimited generations

Hosted & Shareable

No platform fees - Earnings are all yours

# JavaScript Fundamentals: A Practical Guide

Key Takeaways

- Understand the differences between let, const, and var.
- Work with strings, numbers, and booleans.
- Use arrow functions for concise code.
- Implement conditional logic with if, else, and switch.
- Iterate with for, while, and for...of loops.

# Thinking Machines: Mira Murati's AI Revolution

By Helio Gato

8 min read

![Thinking Machines: Mira Murati's AI Revolution](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1591453089816-0fbb971b454c?crop=entropy&cs=tinysrgb&fit=max&fm=jpg&ixid=M3w3NjM1OTN8MHwxfHNlYXJjaHwxfHx0aGlua2luZyUyMG1hY2hpbmVzJTIwbWlyYXxlbnwwfDB8fHwxNzUwODUyMTYyfDA&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&q=80&w=1080&w=800&h=400&fit=crop&q=80)

# Mira Murati's Thinking Machines: A Deep Dive into AI Innovation

## Introduction

Mira Murati, a visionary in the field of artificial intelligence, is once again making waves with her new AI startup, building upon her legacy with Thinking Machines. This playbook provides an in-depth look at her latest venture, exploring its potential impact and the innovative strategies driving its development.

## The Visionary: Mira Murati

Mira Murati has consistently been at the forefront of AI innovation. Her ability to anticipate and shape the future of technology has made her a respected figure in the industry. This section highlights her background and previous accomplishments, setting the stage for understanding her current venture.

### Key Takeaways:

- Mira Murati's track record of successful AI initiatives.
- Her visionary approach to technology development.

## JavaScript Fundamentals Course
Course

# My js course

Master JavaScript fundamentals in this concise course. Learn core concepts from variables to DOM manipulation through practical examples and actionable insights.

By Ijoni4

8 lessons

![My js course](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1501504905252-473c47e087f8?crop=entropy&cs=tinysrgb&fit=max&fm=jpg&ixid=M3w3NjM1OTN8MHwxfHNlYXJjaHwxfHxjb3Vyc2V8ZW58MHwwfHx8MTc1MTQ1MTI0NXww&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&q=80&w=1080&w=800&h=400&fit=crop&q=80)

Course content preview...

Continue Learning

Unlock the full course to access all lessons, quizzes, and interactive content.

$10one-time

Instant access • No subscription

Buy Now - $10Share Course

Course Highlights

- Understand the difference between let, const, and var.
- Work with JavaScript data types: strings, numbers, and booleans.
- Utilize arrow functions for concise code.
- Implement conditional logic with if, else, and switch statements.
- Use loops (for, while, for...of) to iterate through data.

## Benefits of Learning JavaScript
Listicle

# 7 Essential Benefits of Learning JavaScript

Discover the top reasons why JavaScript is an excellent language to learn, covering its versatility in web development, mobile apps, and back-end systems.

By Ijoni4

5 min read

![7 Essential Benefits of Learning JavaScript](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1695370992939-be4eb6fddf35?crop=entropy&cs=tinysrgb&fit=max&fm=jpg&ixid=M3w3NjM1OTN8MHwxfHNlYXJjaHwxfHxlc3NlbnRpYWwlMjBiZW5lZml0cyUyMGxlYXJuaW5nfGVufDB8MHx8fDE3NTEzODI0Nzh8MA&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&q=80&w=1080&w=800&h=400&fit=crop&q=80)

## 7 Key Benefits of Learning JavaScript

JavaScript is a versatile and powerful language that underpins much of the modern web. This list highlights essential benefits of mastering JavaScript, from front-end interactivity to back-end development.

1

## Dynamic Web Pages with DOM Manipulation

JavaScript allows you to manipulate the Document Object Model (DOM), enabling dynamic updates to web pages without requiring a reload. Use `document.querySelector()` to select elements and `addEventListener()` to respond to user interactions. For example, you can change text with `innerText`, modify input values with `value`, or toggle CSS classes with `classList`.

2

## Interactive User Interfaces

Create engaging user interfaces with JavaScript. Implement features like form validation, image sliders, and interactive maps. Use `preventDefault()` to control default browser behaviors and enhance the user experience.

3

## Front-End Frameworks and Libraries

JavaScript is the foundation for popular front-end frameworks and libraries like React, Angular, and Vue.js. These tools provide structure and efficiency for building complex web applications. Learning JavaScript unlocks the ability to leverage these powerful resources.

Continue Reading

Unlock the full article to continue reading and get access to all the examples and insights.

$1one-time

Instant access • No subscription

Buy Now - $1Share List

Key Points

- DOM manipulation for dynamic web pages
- Interactive user interface creation
- Foundation for front-end frameworks
- Back-end development with Node.js
- Cross-platform mobile app development

Tags

JavaScriptweb developmentfront-endback-endNode.jsmobile appsDOM
